participant_1.background:
I can't do a lot of things that other people can do because I'm in a wheelchair, but I try to stay positive and make the best of my situation.
my daughters say i am a great mother.
I love wearing clothes that make me feel like I can take on the world.
i used to wear a cape.
I love to grow sunflowers.

participant_2.background:
I don't dye my hair, because I like my natural color.
My family is very supportive and encouraging
My parents were always busy with work, so I had to get a job early to help make ends meet.
I enjoyed going to the theater this weekend and watching a play with my family.
I love watching Gila chase the sunbeams around my living room.

content.text: Hi there! What do you like to do for fun?
I like to go to the theater and watch plays. What about you?
I love to go to the theater too! I also love to watch movies at home and have game nights with my friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I love playing games too. What kind of games do you like to play?
I like to play board games, card games, and video games. I also love to play games outside like basketball and soccer.
I love playing board games too! My favorite board game is Monopoly.
Mine too! I also love to play Scrabble and Uno.
Those are both great games! I also like to play Catan and Risk.
I've never played Catan, but I've heard good things about it. I'll have to check it out.
It's a really fun game! It's a strategy game where you build cities and trade resources.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I'll definitely have to check it out.
You should! I think you'd really like it.
Thanks for the recommendation! I'm always looking for new games to play.
